VARDESC: {Have you/Has SP} ever used female hormones such as estrogen and progesterone? Please include any forms of prescription female hormones, such as pills, creams, patches, and injectables, but do not include birth control methods or use for infertility.
Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used? (Code all that apply)
{Have you/Has SP} ever taken female hormone pills containing estrogen only (like Premarin)? (Do not include birth control pills.)
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used? (Code all that apply)\" = \"10\""

VARDESC: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {did you take/did she take} pills containing estrogen only? (Code \1\" for less than a month.)"
COMMENT1: ASK IF \{Have you/Has SP} ever taken female hormone pills containing estrogen only (like Premarin)? (Do not include birth control pills.)\" = \"1\""

VARDESC: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {did you take/did she take} pills containing estrogen only? (Code \1\" for less than a month.) Enter number"
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them
COMMENT2: for how long altogether {did you take/did she take} pills containing estrogen only? (Code \"1\" for less than a month.)\" != \"77\" OR \"Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them
VARIABLE_SOURCE: for how long altogether {did you take/did she take} pills containing estrogen only? (Code \"1\" for less than a month.)\" != \"99\""
